p: For each data set, the maximum clade credibility (MCC) tree (tree with the largest product of posterior clade probabilities) was selected from the posterior tree distribution of the best fitting clock/demographic model, after appropriate burn-in, using TreeAnnotator v1.8.4 implemented in the BEAST software package. The final trees were manipulated in FigTree v1.4.3 for display purposes ( http://tree.bio.ed.ac.uk/software/figtree/). XML files for the BEAST runs are available from the authors upon request.
